modName: Light and Enhanced Targe of the Blooded
summary: Turns the Targe of the Blooded (unique shield) into light armor and adds the Spellbreaker enchantment to it, while keeping its bleeding effect on bashing enemies.
descriptionHtml:
Hey there ! This is my first mod so nothing really fancy, but still an improvement of a badass shield i like.

This mod is for those who play light-armored characters and don\'t find a light shield with a badass design. Therefore, the Targe of the Blooded is turned into Light Armor.

In addition, since at high levels the Targe\'s \"emnchantment\" becomes quite useless, I have added the Spellbreaker enchantment to it to make it a little more powerful (its armor value is kinda weak too compared to the other shields a lvl 40/50-ish character could afford to get).

This mod is a standalone and shouldnt conflict with any other mod. If it does, please send me a message and I\'ll get the problem fixed.

Well, thanks for downloading, please endorse this if you liked this small mod. I may keep on modding if I have more ideas !

PS : Being a native french speaker and a fluent spanish and english speaker, if you are looking out for mod translations, voice actors or whatever for a mod, please contact me.
author: Killcam

files.name: Light and Enhanced Targe of the Blooded
